title: Sri Lanka: Postal Voting Begins Today To Elect The Sixth Executive President
content: Source: AT – By Anjana Jayashan in Colombo President Mahinda Rajapaksa Contesting For His Second TermPostal voting for the Presidential elections to elect the country’s sixth executive president will commence today and tomorrow (January 12 and 13), the Elections Secretariat announced. A total of 401,118 are qualified for the postal voting and ballots papers are…
